attributes.title: Worst App
attributes.review: Ok so I am typically all in favor of Trump and his wonderful political actions. However, he has made a terrible mistake in making this app. Itâ€™s very glitchy and I think itâ€™s a very poor thought out idea. First off, the app is allowing you to redeem awards for supporting him. I think that makes his presidential running into more of a game than a serious political event. Therefore, I believe this app should be banned because itâ€™s teaching Gen Z that you must modernize everything and turn everything into some game instead of a serious thing.
